H0.text: In which country was Marie Curie born? Poland, Austria or Switzerland. Poland

H1.text: In which country was Marie Curie born? Poland, Austria or Switzerland. Austria

H2.text: In which country was Marie Curie born? Poland, Austria or Switzerland. Switzerland

H3.text: In which country was Marie Curie born? Poland, Austria or Switzerland. Polnd

A4.text: She was born in Warsaw, in Congress Poland in the Russian Empire

A5.text: She was born in Warsaw, in what was then the Kingdom of Poland, part of the Russian Empire
